text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item title.

Item title:
IBM USB Portable Diskette Floppy Drive for IBM Dell Sony Hp Laptop/pc

Item keywords:
IBM 05K9276 External USB Floppy Disk Drive
Work with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port
Super-slim, lightweight design
Windows 2000, XP, VISTA
Low power requirements, USB powered
Sturdy and attractive
Fully mobile with no power adapter required
Reads and writes 1.44MB diskette media and 720KB

Product description:
text.Response A: This USB floppy drive is very handy for users who have to frequently exchange data between their desktop or laptop and a 1.44MB floppy disk. No external power is required as it is USB powered. It is very portable, sturdy and attractive. It works with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port. This drive is compatible with Windows 2000, XP, VISTA.
text.Response B: DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton is perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more. This DMC Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish. It is 1.76-ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius). Cebelia crochet cotton is available in a wide range of colors. Can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed. Highly colorfast. Comes in a variety of colors. measures 405-Yard length and comes in size 20.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

73.displayed_text:
Prompt

The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item title.

Item title:
IBM USB Portable Diskette Floppy Drive for IBM Dell Sony Hp Laptop/pc

Item keywords:
IBM 05K9276 External USB Floppy Disk Drive
Work with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port
Super-slim, lightweight design
Windows 2000, XP, VISTA
Low power requirements, USB powered
Sturdy and attractive
Fully mobile with no power adapter required
Reads and writes 1.44MB diskette media and 720KB

Product description:

Response A

This USB floppy drive is very handy for users who have to frequently exchange data between their desktop or laptop and a 1.44MB floppy disk. No external power is required as it is USB powered. It is very portable, sturdy and attractive. It works with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port. This drive is compatible with Windows 2000, XP, VISTA.

Response B

DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton is perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more. This DMC Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish. It is 1.76-ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius). Cebelia crochet cotton is available in a wide range of colors. Can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed. Highly colorfast. Comes in a variety of colors. measures 405-Yard length and comes in size 20.
